attributes.action: Open all Zoo’s and Wildlife Parks with safety measures in place before shops.
attributes.additional_details:
Places like Ikea and the retail shops opening should never come before poor innocent animals needing food. We can live without new furniture for a while but these animals need to be fed.

Zoos are also outside and the government have been telling us for ages it’s safer to be outside, so with the right measures in place please look at opening zoos before shops or as part of the next phase on 15th June. It cannot be left any longer with no help from the government.
attributes.background:
Zoos are running out of money because paying customers aren't allowed in. The animals still need food and many zoos are now in desperate need of help.
Some may have to choose which animals should live or die. The government need to allow zoos to reopen with social distancing measures in place.
